name: Pirates
startIntroPart1: Great Blackbeard, the king of pirates, your grandeur in your raids and massacres is incompatible with any empire ever built, the King of the Seven Seas, the pirate leader. Even with the resignation of the British, you remained strong and fought to the death against the navy.
startIntroPart2: Will the captain be able to rebuild the grand pirate empire? Will he be able to overcome the nations that pirates fear?
declaringWar: YAARGH! My ships will crush you!
attacked: My cannons aren't afraid of you!
defeated: I will fight to the end! I will not die in such a humiliating way!
introduction: Hello my king! I am the great Edward Teach, better known as Blackbeard. I hope we get along well.
tradeRequest: Does your nation need pirate gold?
uniques: [+200]% Yield from every [Improvement] <when number of [Cities] is less than [2]>
When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit
Comment [Cannot found more than one city]
[Settler] units gain the [Impossible to Settler] promotion <when number of [Cities] is more than [0]> <hidden from users>
